page.title: 09A Day in the Life of Louise
page.content: I start the day by getting up and having a bath. I have cornflakes and a cup of coffee. I leave the house at 8.5O am. I walk to school with some friends. When we arrive we play until the bell rings then we run into line. In the classroom our teacher calls the register. We go into the Hall for assembly. We talk about God and sing songs. After assembly we have Mathematics. At 1O.3O am we get our milk before we go out to play. We play a game called "Cats got the Measles". After playtime we have English. At 12.OO we go for our dinners. We play again until the bell rings. We work until playtime and then we have a story. We then get our coats and go home at 3.3O pm.
